variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Yukon 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 6.4% on the portion of income up to $57,375. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 9% on the portion of income over $57,375 up to $114,750. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 10.9% on the portion of income over $114,750 up to $177,882. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 12.8% on the portion of income over $177,882 up to $500,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 15% on the portion of income over $500,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_5 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all five brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
